part_prompts.helmet:
Generate a single isolated armor part image.
Part: helmet (helmet shell with visor aperture, no face, no neck).
Style tags: metal, visor, audit. Palette primary=#1E2A3A, secondary=#A8B3C6, emissive=#3AC7FF. Hard-surface industrial hero armor, clean panel lines, production-ready concept sheet.
Requirements:
- White or transparent-like clean background.
- Centered object, orthographic feel, no perspective distortion.
- No human body, no full character, no text, no watermark.
- Crisp edge definition for texture/decal extraction.
